CSharpSnippetActionItem.CSharpCodeSnippet: Sage.Entity.Interfaces.ISalesOrder salesOrder = this.BindingSource.Current as Sage.Entity.Interfaces.ISalesOrder; rdgSOType.SelectedIndex = salesOrder.IsQuote.HasValue && salesOrder.IsQuote.Value ? 1 : 0;
Sage.Entity.Interfaces.ISalesOrder salesOrder = this.BindingSource.Current as Sage.Entity.Interfaces.ISalesOrder; salesOrder.IsQuote = (rdgSOType.SelectedIndex == 1);
